Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: paw
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Cute but inflexible paws have replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands. They lack a thumb, which has receded into a useless dewclaw.

li.label: bestial
li.description: This paw has degraded into a more inflexible paw than normal, and is not very useful.
Each finger on this hand is tipped with a sharp claw.
In addition to claws, this hand is developing thick pads on the palm and each fingertip.
This hand looks more like a paw than a hand, but isn't completely useless.
This hand's fingers have started to shorten, and a short coat of fur has sprouted over it.
[PAWN_nameDef] has largely adapted to having paws, and is trying to recover flexibility in the digits.
li.label: adapted

li.description: Further adaptation to this paw has caused the digits to lengthen and gain flexibility again. The long nails tend to snag on gloves, but otherwise [PAWN_nameDef] can use this handpaw about as well as a regular hand.

Even further adaptation to this handpaw has given [PAWN_nameDef] incredibly fine motor control over [PAWN_possessive] paw-fingers. [PAWN_pronoun] can grasp and manipulate things with [PAWN_possessive] nails more precisely than [PAWN_pronoun] ever could with regular fingers.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: hoof
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: It's terrifying, but [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands are nothing more than hooves now. Holding things, grabbing things and doing anything requiring thumbs is going to be a lot more difficult.

li.description: This entire hand has melded together in a grotesque fashion, causing it to look like a malformed hoof.
The fingernails on this hand have broadened and thickened to a point where they're much harder to use, and they get in the way contstantly.
Each finger on this hand is tipped with a thicker nail that's slowly dominating the length of each digit.
Each finger on this hand has a large, dark hoof-like nail on it. Some of the fingers seem to be shortening.
Above a humanlike palm, two fingers have paired up and merged. This reduces manipulation, but not nearly as much as having a full hoof instead.
This hand, or hoof, is quickly becoming less flexible and more like a regular hoof. Its usability may be hampered soon.
[PAWN_nameDef] has adapted to using hooves, and will have slightly less trouble with working with them.
li.label: adapted

li.description: Further adaptation has resulted in the hoof splitting apart and growing into two hoof-tipped fingers and a thumb. They look strange, but they give [PAWN_nameDef] better manipulation than a regular hoof would.
Even further adaptation to this handhoof has increased the flexibility of the hoof-fingers to the point where they function about as well as an ordinary hand.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: trotter
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands resemble trotters more than anything else, leaving them with little in the way of grasping ability.

li.description: This entire hand has melded together in a grotesque fashion, causing it to look like a malformed hoof.
The fingernails on this hand have broadened and thickened to a point where they're much harder to use, and they get in the way contstantly.
Each finger on this hand is tipped with a thicker nail that's slowly dominating the length of each digit.
Each finger on this hand has a large, dark hoof-like nail on it. Some of the fingers seem to be shortening.
This hand, or trotter, is quickly becoming less flexible and more like a regular trotter. Its usability may be hampered soon.
[PAWN_nameDef] has adapted to using trotters, and will have slightly less trouble with working with them.
li.label: adapted

li.description: Further adaptation has resulted in the trotter growing out into two hoof-tipped fingers and a thumb. They look strange, but they give [PAWN_nameDef] better manipulation than a regular trotter would.
Even further adaptation to this handtrotter has increased the flexability of the hoof-fingers to the point where they function about as well as an ordinary hand.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: feline
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: This hand has reshaped to become like a paw, complete with retractable claws. This gives [PAWN_objective] a combat advantage, yet makes it harder to wipe [PAWN_possessive] ass.

li.description: Whatever mutations the mechanites in [PAWN_nameDef]'s blood were trying to invoke have gone horribly awry, leaving [PAWN_possessive] hands weak and inflexible.

li.label: long nails
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingernails are growing at an alarming rate.

li.label: clawed
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingernails have become long, curved and pointed, like that of a feline.

li.label: padded
li.description: Fleshy pads have appeared on [PAWN_nameDef]'s palm and fingers, giving the clawed hand a more catlike appearance. [PAWN_objective] thumb has grown weaker as well, making grasping things much more difficult.

li.label: contorted
li.description: The first joint of each of [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have shortend and reversed directions. The joint unfurls when [PAWN_pronoun] unclenches [PAWN_possessive] hands, bringing [PAWN_possessive] new claws to bear.

li.label: unfamiliar
li.description: The mechanites have finished their work on [PAWN_nameDef]'s new cat-like paws, yet they still remain foreign and unfamiliar to [PAWN_objective] and will take some to get used to.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s hands have reshaped to become like paws, complete with retractable claws. This gives [PAWN_objective] a combat advantage, yet makes it harder to wipe [PAWN_possessive] ass.

Further adaption to this handpaw have increased the flexibility and precision of the digits, allowing [PAWN_nameDef] to use [PAWN_pronoun] claws as delicately as [PAWN_pronoun] would fingers. The paw now functions about as well as a hand again, as long as [PAWN_nameDef] is careful not to squeeze too hard.

Even further adaption to this handpaw have given [PAWN_nameDef] a remarkable deftness with [PAWN_possessive] claw-tipped fingers. They can rend [PAWN_possessive] foes with a swipe, and yet when working on delicate tasks they're even more gentle and precise than ordinary fingers would be.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: wingtip
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have mostly disappeared into a lump of bird-skinned flesh, with many feathers protruding from the nub.

li.label: changing
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have shrunken down significantly, making manipulating things much harder.

stages.label: feather fingers
stages.description: Further adaption to this wingtip has given [PAWN_nameDef] several stiff feathers that [PAWN_pronoun] can manipulate. [PAWN_pronoun] can use them sort of like fingers, but being nothing more than feathers they have a hard time really grasping anything.

li.label: paragon
li.description: Even further adaption has rendered [PAWN_nameDef]'s feather fingers remarkably stiff and flexible, and they now work almost as well as actual fingers. [PAWN_nameDef] looks a lot like a cartoon character when [PAWN_pronoun] picks things up, but it's a small price to pay to have working hands again.
